data.title: Peter Masterson Share With Friend - Waterford, New York
data.meta_description: WATERVLIET Peter Michael “Gus” Masterson, 60, of Cornsilk Rd. died Monday November 4, 2013 at Samaritan Hospital surrounded by his loving family.  Born in Troy he is son of Charles J. Masterson of Indiantown, FL and the late June Leonard Masterson.  He was a graduate of Waterford Halfmoon High School.  Gus was employed for over 30 years at the New York State Dept. of Taxation and Finance in Albany retiring in 2010.  He was a member of Civil Service Employees Association and Public Employees Federation.  He had belonged to the Taxation and Finance Golf League and in his earlier years he had coached in the North Colonie Baseball League.  In addition to golf Gus enjoyed bowling and fishing.  In addition to his father he is survived by his wife Marlys Schuster Masterson, his sons, Brian T. Masterson of Clifton Park and Andrew M. Masterson of Watervliet.  He is the brother of Christine Barger of Saratoga, Jay Masterson of Lisbon WI and Patty Masterson of Cohoes. Several nieces and nephews also survive.  Funeral services will be Thursday evening at 8 p.m. at Philip J. Brendese Funeral Home, 133 Broad St. (Rte. 32), Waterford.  Relatives and friends may visit at the funeral home Thursday from 4 – 8 p.m. prior to the service.  Those who wish may make memorial contributions to Community Hospice, 295 Valley View Blvd., Rensselaer, NY 12144.
